module.name: skrill
module.description: Bezpieczne płatności online dla Twojej firmy Budujemy nasze rozwiązania wokół Ciebie
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Bezpieczne płatności online dla Twojej firmy Budujemy nasze rozwiązania wokół Ciebie. Skorzystaj z nowoczesnego, elastycznego i zoptymalizowanego rozwiązania płatniczego - wszystko w ramach jednej umowy, jednej integracji i bezpłatnej konfiguracji.
module.additional_description: Darmowa i szybka konfiguracjaDostęp do kart kredytowych, ponad 20 lokalnych metod płatności i obsługa ponad 80 bankówSkorzystaj z wielowalutowego konta Skrill, dającego dostęp do ponad 40 walutNajwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa i technologia zapobiegająca nadużyciomPłynne płatności za pomocą telefonu, tabletu i desktopaDołącz do milionów posiadaczy kont Skril

module.name: paypal
module.description: Bezpłatny moduł PayPal może pomóc w zwiększeniu sprzedaży, zapewniając sklepom opcę płatności poprzez PayPal
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Bezpłatny moduł PayPal może pomóc w zwiększeniu sprzedaży, zapewniając sklepom opcę płatności poprzez PayPal. Dzięki setkom milionów użytkowników, PayPal jest jedną z najbardziej rozpoznawalnych i zaufanych marek na świecie.
module.additional_description: Szybkie i bezproblemowe finalizowanie transakcjiZoptymalizowany proces finalizacji transakcji pomaga zmniejszyć liczbę porzuceń koszyka, zwiększyć współczynniki konwersji i zachęcić do powtórnych zakupów. Dzięki PayPal klienci mogą korzystać z zapisanych danych rozliczeniowych i informacji dotyczących wysyłki, co pozwala na szybsze transakcje na dowolnym urządzeniu.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.description: Official module for Boxtal, shipping solution with no subscription or commitment. Synchronize your orders with Boxtal and ship them with the best carriers on the market
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Official module for Boxtal, shipping solution with no subscription or commitment. Synchronize your orders with Boxtal and ship them with the best carriers on the market. Display a parcel point map during checkout.
module.additional_description: Save 2 hours a day Your orders are synchronized with your Boxtal account, where you can automate shipping rules to generate your shipping labels. Ship with all types of carriers (express, relay, home, letters, parcels, pallets, France, international, ...), with or without insurance, options, ... A single invoice for all your shipments and a single customer service to manage all delivery issues. Tech support that responds, not useless chatbots.

module.name: paybox
module.description: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole. You can easily install the solution on your PrestaShop online store to offer your customers a personalized shopping experience
module.additional_description: For several years, Crédit Agricole has been supporting thousands of French e-retailers with the Up2pay e-Transactions solution that meets their needs and those of their customers.With Up2pay e-transactions, you benefit from all the advantages of a well-known french bank:- One of the most attractive electronic banking commission rates on the market from the start of your activity- Payment of cash receipts into your account on D+1- A single contact person to meet your needs- After-sales support included (email and telephone) based in France Discover our commitment-free offer here. New : Up2pay e-Transactions Prestashop module is 3D Secure V2 compliant, in accordance with DSP2 regulation.[1] Up2pay e-Transactions is an offer subject to general and pricing conditions, reserved for professionals registered in France, excluding Marketplaces. The Up2pay e-Transactions offer requires a Crédit Agricole account agreement and the signature of an e-commerce card payment acceptance contract including the Up2pay e-Transactions services option.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews.
module.additional_description: We offer a solution that will give you a 360 degree "voice of the customer" strategy which includes: multichannel collection, monitoring and moderation platform, statistics engine & verbatim analysis, syndication of opinions, and retrieval of opinions from third-party sources. 1. A quick and easy all-in-one solution. 2. From site reviews, product reviews, and business reviews everything in our soultion can be adapted to your needs including personalized opinion email requests, campaign deadlines, and how the widgets are displayed. 3. Google Partner - display stars in your search and PLA google ads campaigns thanks to our partnership with Google. 4. A trusted third party - Our feedback requests are make after the purchase on 100% of your buyers. 5. By turning customer opinions into a KPI, you are engaging with your teams in a positive way, engaging in better communication and optimizing your entire business. 6. Take advantage of the interconnection between our opinion platform and other Skeepers products and put your customer at the heart of your marketing strategy.

module.additional_description: Effortlessly manage product listings with centralised and automated feed activities across marketplaces and marketing channelsExpand your online presence and reach new customers on niche or popular marketplacesOptimise your catalogue to improve your data quality and product visibility across all channelsCentralise order management and keep track of their inventory in a single platformLeverage price intelligence data from your competitors to optimise your pricing and marketing campaign strategies

module.name: jmarketplace
module.description: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission
module.author: JA Modules
module.description_full: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission.
module.additional_description: We are quality leaders and PrestaShop experts with more than 15 years of experience in the sector and we can guarantee that this product can help you a lot to get the goal you want. We know and like what we do, that's why we offer you the best of us, in a very complete product and at the best price. Our module, your trust marketplace. This module is synonymous with analysis, constant work and innovation. We always listen to your suggestions and requests to improve it and make a more competent, complete product with a good technical support team that is attentive to solve all doubts and problems, always giving the best possible result. Benefits for administrator Expansion catalog with products from other sellers.More sales possibilities.More offer for customers.Compatible with any payment method.All customer purchases are received by the market. When appropriate, vendor commissions can be paid.Very complete management of sellers, products, commissions, etc.Very complete control panel or dashboard where you will be able to see all the market advances.Fixed commission per sale.Variable commission by seller, category or levels (Bronze, Silver and Gold).Super complete configuration per page or functionality. You will not have to modify the code to enable or disable functions on the front.Communication system between client, seller and administrator through the platform.Compatible with most of the available themes. It is ideal to choose a theme that it has been developed with Bootstrap 3 technology or higher. Benefits for the seller Easy and intuitive product management.Export and import products en masse.Management of the seller profile.Commission history.Order history and management.Creates your own carriers and shipping rates.Selection of the preferred payment method to collect your commissions.Graph of commissions received.Request for withdrawal of funds.Centralized marketplace message box.

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.
module.additional_description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions. What this module does for you-      Easy set-up, plug & play-      Responsive design-      All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home (national & international)@pickup point (national & international)@Parcels locker International-      Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module-      Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation)-      Print directly from the backend-      Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Połącz Twój PrestaShop z wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi, jak eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister czy CDiscount
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Połącz Twój PrestaShop z wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi, jak eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister czy CDiscount.
module.additional_description: Optymizuje widoczność Twoich produktów na platformach handlowychSprzedawaj więcej niż kiedykolwiek dotąd: 78% zakupów w internecie odbywa się na wielkich platformach, jak Amazon czy eBay. To właśnie są najważniejsze kanały sprzedaży, które dramatycznie poprawią Twoje możliwości zbytu. magnalister zrobi z Twojego PrestaShop centralę zarządzania, z której możesz wygodnie sterować inwentarzem i zamówieniami na wszystkich podłączonych platformach sprzedażowych.magnalister to idealne połączenie pomiędzy sklepem PrestaShop a wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi. 4 centralne procesy dbają o optymalne zarządzanie sprzedażą:Wystawianie produktów wprost z PrestaShop (z użyciem opisu, grafik, innych danych jak marka, kolor czy kod EAN, zapisanych w sklepie PrestaShop) na platformy sprzedażowe,Import zamówień z platform do panelu zamówień sklepu PrestaShop,Synchronizacja stanów magazynu i cen ze sklepu PrestaShop na platformy sprzedażowe,Synchronizacja statusu zamówień ("Wysłane") ze sklepu PrestaShop na platformy sprzedażowe. Dodatkowe funkcje, jak zarządzanie wariacjami produktów, czy elastyczna konfiguracja cen dla każdej platformy czynią sprzedaż multikanałową czystą przyjemnością.Pierwsze 30 dni gratis! Po zarejestrowaniu w serwisie otrzymasz klucz aktywacyjny (PassPhrase), którym możesz aktywować moduł. Przez pierwsze 30 dni nie pobieramy żadnych opłat. Po upływie tego okresu magnalister kosztuje (łącznie z wsparciem) od 29,- EUR miesięcznie (+VAT).

module.name: chronopost
module.description: To support your shipping needs, Chronopost, the express delivery leader, offers two solutions tailored to your shipment volume
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: To support your shipping needs, Chronopost, the express delivery leader, offers two solutions tailored to your shipment volume. This way, you can provide your customers with quick delivery options to pickup points or home!
module.additional_description: You have two options based on your shipment volumes : a no-contract plan or a contract-based plan. Shipping 1-50 packages/month?Discover Chronopost Pro, a 100% digital solution with no contract. Fixed, all-inclusive rates. Simply select one of four weight ranges to determine your shipping cost.Discounts of up to 25% based on your volume.Free access to 5 delivery options within mainland France and 4 international options.Free pickup for purchases over €50.Dedicated customer support via live chat from your Chronopost.fr client area. Easy Setup: Download the module and connect your PrestaShop store to your Chronopost Pro account. Shipping over 50 packages per month or have specific needs (large volume, wine, food, healthcare)?The contract-based option is ideal for you ! A representative will contact you to find the best solution based on your shipment type, destination, and budget. Fill out the form here: Chronopost Contact Form.From label creation, pickup, and delivery to innovative tracking tools, let’s work together to define the right option for you. Getting Started: Complete your Chronopost contract, download, and configure the module.

module.name: ndk_steppingpack
module.description: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Zwiększ sprzedaż online i zautomatyzuj rozmowy dzięki Smartsupp. Oferujemy wszystko, czego potrzebujesz, aby zwiększyć sprzedaż online: AI, Czatboty LeadGen, Live Czat i dużo więcej
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Zwiększ sprzedaż online i zautomatyzuj rozmowy dzięki Smartsupp. Oferujemy wszystko, czego potrzebujesz, aby zwiększyć sprzedaż online: AI, Czatboty LeadGen, Live Czat i dużo więcej. Angażuj odwiedzających i zamień ich w zadowolonych klientów.
module.additional_description: Rozpocznij sprzedaż i zwiększ konwersję dzięki Smartsupp. Nasze pakiety oferują wszystko, czego potrzebujesz: AI, Czatboty LeadGen i Live Czat – narzędzia, które pomogą Ci zmienić odwiedzających w zadowolonych klientów. Zautomatyzuj odpowiedzi na powtarzające się pytania i zapewnij klientom indywidualne podejście, które jest w ramach sprzedaży najważniejsze. Uzyskaj wgląd w obsługę klienta dzięki dokładnym statystykom – śledź zadowolenie klientów, wydajność agentów i nie tylko. Jeśli chcesz korzystać z jednej z najbardziej zaufanych na świecie aplikacji do obsługi klientów, skorzystaj ze Smartsupp. Obecnie wspieramy ponad 100 000 sklepów i stron internetowych, aby mogły one działać jeszcze wydajniej:Czatuj z klientami i buduj silne relacje. Uzupełnieniem do naszego łatwego w instalacji i szybkiego okna czatu jest Messenger i poczta e-mail, dzięki czemu każda rozmowa jest dostępna za pośrednictwem naszych aplikacji mobilnych.Zamień odwiedzających w klientów, prowadząc potężne kampanie leadgenowe z automatycznymi wiadomościami i czatbotami.Angażuj zarówno klientów, jak i odwiedzających, dzięki naszym AI asystentom sprzedaży i opieki, którzy są zawsze dostępni i gotowi do pomocy.Poznaj nie tylko przebieg rozmów, jak zadowoleni są Twoi klienci z Twojego zespołu i oferty, o co pytają – ale także kto konwertuje zaraz, a kto wymaga Twojej dodatkowej uwagi. Co mówią o nas nasi użytkownicy? "Dzięki Smartsupp nasz sklep internetowy odnosi jeszcze większe sukcesy! Po prostej instalacji od razu uzyskaliśmy pierwszego klienta z pytaniem, po czym od razu złożył zamówienie."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "Dzięki Smartsupp korzystamy z jednego czatu w kilku sklepach! To pozwoliło nam usprawnić nasz kontakt z klientami. Komunikacja jest błyskawiczna i wygodna zarówno dla nas, jak i dla klientów."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70% naszych zamówień odbywa się za pośrednictwem live czatu.”—Irena ŽIROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

module.name: crisp
module.description: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants. The platform comes with a live chat widget, an AI Chatbot and many other features that deeply integrates with your Prestashop online store.
module.additional_description: Transform your customer service into a new acquisition's channel Crisp is a multichannel customer experience platform that helps online store to centralize inbound messages to land into one inbox, allowing merchants to avoid switching back and forth between Facebook, Instagram, Email Inbox or WhatsApp and phone calls. Through a powerful data synchronization between Prestashop and Crisp, merchants can create personnalized and unique support experience. No matter customer's state, retailers will aways stay ahead. The platform offers ready-to-use tools that will make online merchants ready and powerful today, not in a month: Sales and FAQ chatbot templates, empowered by AI and trained on product data are designed to increase revenue and answer repetitive customer's questions. Through a flat-rate pricing, merchants using Crisp for Prestashop can preserve their margins while scaling their customer support process. All-in-all, Crisp for Prestashop doesn't only provide a live chat, an AI Chatbot or a shared inbox: It's full suite of tools dedicated at making online merchants more efficient in their daily customers' relationship tasks. How does Crisp stands out from the crowd?- 55% resolution rate powered by Crisp AI Chatbot- 100% no-code solution to empower teams from any sector- Lightweight chat widget made not to slowdown website loading speed- Free mobile and desktop iOs & Android app- Flat-rate pricing on all our plans- In-house AI models for better privacy-driven companies Simple things you can do to scale your customer support in less than 5 minutes- Decrease bounce rate and CPC with proactive and personnalized chat messages- Improve average number of conversations per agent by creating templated message that leverage dynamic data shared through Prestashop data- Connect channels such as emails, Instagram DMs or Messenger to your Crisp inbox- Build bots to automate repetitive questions on any channels thanks to ready-to-use chatbot templates- Train AI models on custom data such as website data, product data or conversational data. Numbers behind Crisp- 500 000 customers around the world- 50+ languages available- 210 000 000 users each month- 24/5 customer support available in 5 different languages

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Stripe Stripe zawiera wiele funkcji pozwalających na zwiększenie przychodów i stworzenie płynnej obsługi klienta, w tym obsługę ponad 40 metod płatności; metody „kup teraz, zapłać później”, takie jak
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Stripe Stripe zawiera wiele funkcji pozwalających na zwiększenie przychodów i stworzenie płynnej obsługi klienta, w tym obsługę ponad 40 metod płatności; metody „kup teraz, zapłać później”, takie jak Klarna i Clearpay; oraz Link czy przyspieszoną realizację transakcji. To, co kiedyś zajmowało setki godzin, może być wykonane przez firmę w ciągu zaledwie jednego popołudnia.
module.additional_description: Zapewnij klientom najlepszą w swojej klasie obsługę płatności, jednocześnie koncentrując się na swojej podstawowej działalności. Firmy korzystające z realizacji płatności ze Stripe odnotowały średnio o 11,9% wyższe przychody. Stripe może pomóc klientom:Zwiększyć liczbę konwersji.Rozszerzyć bazę klientów.Obniżyć koszty.Zredukować czas i wysiłek. Zwiększenie liczby konwersji Stripe używa algorytmów szkolonych na miliardach punktów danych, aby wyświetlać i porządkować metody płatności włączone przez użytkownika w celu zmaksymalizowania konwersji każdego klienta na każdej stronie. Rozszerzenie bazy klientów Pozyskuj klientów, którzy w przeciwnym razie mogliby porzucić koszyk, dzięki opcjom typu „kup teraz, zapłać później”, takim jak Klarna i Clearpay oraz lokalnym metodom płatności, takim jak Cartes Bancaires, polecenie zapłaty BACS, Blik, Bizum i przelewy bankowe. Obniż koszty Zmniejsz koszty transakcji dzięki tańszym metodom płatności. Oszczędzaj pieniądze i zwalczaj oszustwa dzięki Stripe Radar, usłudze, która współpracuje płynnie z platformą Stripe. Zredukuj czas i wysiłek Uruchamiaj metody płatności w ciągu kilku minut zamiast dni oraz upraszczaj operacje i zarządzanie dzięki zunifikowanemu monitorowaniu, raportowaniu i wypłatom. Zabezpiecz na przyszłość swoją firmę, konfigurując nowe metody płatności, kiedy tylko będą obsługiwane.

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: santanderpaymentsolutions

module.author: Patworx Multimedia

module.additional_description: No risk – Santander takes on the default risk for Purchases on Account and Instalment Purchases at 100%. You receive your money – guaranteed. Real time saving – Santander is responsible for the collection process and thereby reduces your administrative effort. Individual settlement – you receive monthly transaction overviews, adapted to your individual needs Conversion increase – you benefit from the popularity of the product Purchase on Account, the preferred payment method for many customers. Improved liquidity for you – With Purchase on Account and Instalment Purchase you receive your payments each working day without having to wait for the value date. With Direct Transfer the customer instantly transfers the purchase amount to your account. Improved liquidity for your customers – you allow more customers to finance expensive goods with the help of variable instalments and flexile durations. Increased customer loyalty – your customers appreciate the uncomplicated handling and the respectful communication at eye level. Flexible payment – Purchase on Account allows your customer to pay payment terms of up to 30 days. Instalment Purchase offers variable instalments and flexible durations ranging from 3 to 26 months. Direct Transfer allows customers to pay the purchase amount via bank transfer without leaving the shop check-out.

module.additional_description: Acutrack is a technology-driven, e-commerce fulfillment company - with a specialization in publishing books and media-on-demand. We are one of the few companies that offer both fulfillment and publishing services, allowing our customers to seamlessly integrate all of their logistical needs with just one partner. We are a perfect fit for anyone who has content to fulfill and publish, such as self-publishers, marketers, and trainers. Acutrack is your behind-the-scenes logistics partner, letting you focus on just one thing - growing your business! Reliable PartnerWhen it comes to your inventory, customers, and orders, you want a partner who has a strong track record and is transparent in its dealings. With 25-years of experience, Acutrack is a reliable partner. Don't just take our word for it! Check out Acutrack reviews on Trustpilot. Book Fulfillment Made EasyAcutrack's comprehensive suite of book fulfillment and distribution services helps businesses deliver their books directly to consumers (B2C) or to retail and other marketplaces like Amazon (B2B) etc.Print small or large runs, using offset or digital technology to meet your forecastTeam of experts in graphic design, print, kitting & packagingWidest range of book trim size & binding options Fulfillment driven by TechnologyAcutrack seamlessly integrates with Prestashop and over 100 other eCommerce platforms. Acutrack delivers an error-free solution to you and your customers. withAn online dashboard that provides 24 x 7 access andA strong API support, Unparalleled Customer ServiceDedicated and personalized supportConsultative business partner Full transparency

module.description: Ułatw zakupy w Twoim sklepie internetowym dzięki rozwiązaniu płatniczemu PrestaShop Checkout stworzonemu we współpracy z PayPal
module.author: PrestaShop

module.additional_description: Prostota Wszystko w jednym, łatwym w użytkowaniu module płatności od PrestaShop:Zarządzanie transakcjami i historia zamówień w jednym interfejsieZarządzanie zwrotami (częściowymi i całkowitymi)Łatwa obsługa księgowościOptymalna konwersja Błyskawicznie akceptuj płatności przy użyciu kart płatniczych, konta PayPal lub innych, lokalnie używanych metod płatności. Dzięki Express Checkout, zintegruj przycisk szybkiego zakupu na stronach produktów lub zamówień. Redukcja liczby kliknięć o połowę, może zwiększyć konwersję nawet o 80%. Rozwój międzynarodowy Akceptuj do 20 różnych walut i sprzedawaj bez granic w ponad 190 krajach. Bezpieczne płatności PayPal chroni każdą transakcję, aby zabezpieczyć informacje o płatnościach Twoich klientów i zapobiec oszustwom w Twojej witrynie. Dzięki systemowi 3D Secure, płatności w Twoim sklepie są chronione od wszelkiego rodzaju oszustw. PayPal umożliwia bezpieczne przechowywanie metod płatności klientów, zmniejszając ryzyko związane z bezpieczeństwem i zgodnością z przepisami oraz zapewniając szybką i łatwą realizację transakcji. Dzięki zapisanym informacjom o płatnościach klienci mogą łatwo dokonywać ponownych zakupów za pomocą zaledwie kilku kliknięć, co pomaga poprawić konwersję przy kasie. Poznaj nasze preferencyjne i przejrzyste stawkiBrak opłat za instalacjęBrak opłat miesięcznychProwizja od każdej metody płatnościPrestashop Checkout oferuje bardzo konkurencyjne stawki transakcji. Zobacz nasz cennik, aby poznać szczegóły dotyczące Twojego kraju. Możemy zaoferować niestandardowe ceny dla firm o miesięcznych przychodach powyżej 50 000 euro. module.displayName: EngageBay - Marketing, Sales CRM & Live Chat

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: You can add/update order as a Contact or Lead automatically into EngageBay CRM when you add a new order or update an existing order on your site. You can also add/update Contacts or Leads automatically into EngageBay CRM when the customer adds/updates/registers on your site.  The operation is very simple. Once the module is installed, you can sync your catalog, your customers, and your orders. Therefore, you can manage your online orders and your offsite controls from within the same web interface. Generate more leads using our lead grabbing features like web pop ups, embed forms, landing pages. Engage and nurture the leads using marketing automation. Convert them into paying customers using the CRM, live chat features, also provide post sales support using our help desk module.

module.author: Silbersaiten

Optionally, you can also store your bank data in the module configuration and transfer them to Business Portal.

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an Zettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via Zettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to Zettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to Zettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the Zettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and Zettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Import Zettle orders to PrestaShopOrders that have been completed on Zettle will be imported to PrestaShop automatically. This module enables you to have all orders in one place. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between Zettle and PrestaShop is based on the Zettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard.  The services include: Zettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The Zettle Reader:The Zettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The Zettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the Zettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

Thanks to various export filters and settings, you can set up the feed in a targeted manner to optimize your performance and use your marketing budget optimally. Profit from:Increased number of visitors to your online shopImproved conversion rate through high quality trafficVisibility of your products and your website on one of the leading e-commerce platforms in Europe

module.name: revolutpayment
module.description: Czy wiesz, że Revolut Business oferuje również produkty dla sprzedawców prowadzących sklepy internetowe? Posiadając konto Revolut Business, możesz zacząć przyjmować płatności online za pośrednictwem m
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Czy wiesz, że Revolut Business oferuje również produkty dla sprzedawców prowadzących sklepy internetowe? Posiadając konto Revolut Business, możesz zacząć przyjmować płatności online za pośrednictwem modułu Revolut Gateway. Moduł ten pozwala wszystkim klientom — nie tylko tym korzystającym z Revolut — płacić za pomocą kart Visa lub Mastercard (w tym kart wydanych przez Revolut). Dzięki Revolut Business możesz akceptować płatności kartą w nawet 18 walutach, a środki trafią na Twoje konto już następnego dnia! Ponadto zyskasz możliwość zarządzania wszystkimi finansami swojej firmy w jednym miejscu.
module.additional_description: Świetne ceny:Nie stracisz swoich ciężko zarobionych pieniędzy — oferujemy konkurencyjne ceny dla firm każdej wielkości.Stawki za przetworzenie płatności wynoszą 1% + 0,20 GBP/EUR w przypadku lokalnych kart konsumenckich oraz 2,8% + 0,20 GBP/EUR w przypadku innych kart.Nie poniesiesz dodatkowych kosztów za akceptowanie różnych walut (mogą obowiązywać opłaty za wymianę), rozliczenia następnego dnia czy monitorowanie transakcji pod kątem oszustw. Poprawa konwersji przy finalizacji transakcji:Szybsze finalizowanie sprzedaży i zwiększenie konwersji dzięki bezproblemowej obsłudze systemu Revolut Pay, który umożliwia klientom dokonanie płatności jednym kliknięciem.Wskaźniki autoryzacji płatności są wyższe w przypadku Revolut Pay w porównaniu do płatności kartą, dzięki czemu możesz zarabiać wydajniej. Wzmocnij swoją pozycję na rynku międzynarodowym:Akceptuj płatności w nawet 18 walutach w przypadku płatności kartą i aż 27 walutach w przypadku płatności systemem Revolut Pay, i korzystaj z dedykowanych kont walutowych.Przechowuj i wymieniaj ponad 25 walut, korzystając z niezwykle konkurencyjnych opłat.Kontroluj ryzyko rynku walutowego, ustalając stały kurs dla przyszłych transakcji wymiany (usługa dostępna w wybranych planach Revolut Business). Rozliczenia i bezpieczeństwo:Otrzymuj zarobione pieniądze bezpośrednio na swoje Konto Handlowca. Ogranicz ryzyko nadużyć finansowych, polegając na narzędziach Revolut Business do monitorowania transakcji, które ostrzegą Cię na wypadek wykrycia wczesnych oznak oszustwa.Korzystaj z bezpiecznego rozwiązania do przyjmowania płatności, które jest zabezpieczone szyfrowaniem i posiada certyfikat PCI DSS. Revolut Pay:Zapewnij swoim klientom łatwe płatności jednym kliknięciem dzięki Revolut Pay i ciesz się wyższymi wskaźnikami akceptacji oraz niższymi opłatami transakcyjnymi.Klienci, którzy jeszcze nie korzystają z Revolut, mogą otrzymać do 20 GBP/EUR cashbacku, jeśli dokonają płatności za pośrednictwem Revolut Pay i zarejestrują się w Revolut (obowiązuje Regulamin).Pieniądze za transakcje Revolut Pay otrzymasz w ciągu 24 godzin.Wszystko w jednym miejscu:Ciesz się wyjątkowo intuicyjnym interfejsem, korzystając z jednej platformy do obsługi Konta Handlowca oraz konta Revolut Business.Korzystaj z dostępu do licznych funkcji biznesowych, w tym płynnych płatności i przelewów międzynarodowych. Zarządzaj wszystkimi finansami swojej firmy w jednym miejscu, za pośrednictwem aplikacji mobilnej lub internetowej.Zwiększ możliwości swojego zespołu i kontroluj wydatki — dzięki fizycznym i wirtualnym kartom debetowym Twoi pracownicy łatwo zdobędą to, co jest im potrzebne do pracy.Ustalaj limity wydatków na kartach i trzymaj rękę na pulsie, przeglądając statystyki w czasie rzeczywistym.

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features&q
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features" tab). The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. This synchronisation is necessary for the good operation of the modules concerned. Uninstalling the PS EventBus module may cause these modules to crash or even stop working completely.

Integration with Square POS systems keeps your online and in-store orders, items and inventory in sync. Use Order Manager to see all orders in one place – no matter where they originate. And Customer Directory syncs buyer contact info, sales history and more for enhanced analytics.Accept multiple payment methods including all major credit and debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay as well as Square gift cards.Simplify the payment experience with built-in-refunds and saving customer cards on file.Gain peace of mind knowing Square is secure with end-to-end encryption and built-in SCA compliance.

module.name: gelproximity
module.description: With GEL Proximity connect your shop with over 300,000 Collection Points in Italy and Europe including newsstands, post offices, tobacconists, shops and lockers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With GEL Proximity connect your shop with over 300,000 Collection Points in Italy and Europe including newsstands, post offices, tobacconists, shops and lockers. Download the free form to enable Proximity shipments and returns.
module.additional_description: DescriptionReduce logistical checkout abandonment rates and increase conversions! With GEL Proximity, logistics is no longer a problem! The platform helps eCommerce shops manage the complexities of various networks of Pickup Points by optimising the entire shipping process, from label printing to border generation, from tracking status monitoring to sending customised notifications with the company brand. You can choose which networks to enable to ship in Italy and Europe based on their services and capillarity over the territory, define picking times for each warehouse, enable your own contracts with couriers, customise the Pickup Point map on the checkout, enable full-risk insurance on shipping services and storage at the Pickup Point, and much more! Our mission is the success of your shop!GEL Proximity aims at the sustainability and growth of the eCommerce channel by offering the greatest number of Proximity logistics proposals that demonstrate a focus on the customer, urban logistics and the reduction of emissions, giving priority to the parcel collection system.Be part of the sustainable change:Alternative solutions to home delivery for your customersLower and transparent shipping costsReduction of CO₂ emissions Benefits?Proposes a delivery method adapted to your customersOptimises the user experienceAllows you to acquire new customers

module.name: soisy
module.description: Soisy is the Buy Now Pay Later solution from 3 installments upwards, for e-commerce with carts between €100 and €15000. Your customer can pay back in 3, 6, 18, 24, ..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Soisy is the Buy Now Pay Later solution from 3 installments upwards, for e-commerce with carts between €100 and €15000. Your customer can pay back in 3, 6, 18, 24, ... up to 36 installments, with the first installment after 30 days.
module.additional_description: With the Soisy Buy Now Pay Later solution, you increase the average amount of your carts, your conversions and sales because your customers can divide the cart amount into the number of installments that suits them most, from 3 installments upwards; these “smaller” payments increase their purchasing power and stimulate shopping cart One installment payment, many advantages 1. Increase conversions+ 250% with the interest-free loan: zero interests and no commissions for your customers 2. Spend lesswith the loan with interests solution: less costs for you, and interests paid by your customers 3. Get the money immediately: once the loan is approved, we will transfer the amount to your Soisy payment account within the following 24 hours 4. No credit risk for you if the customer does not pay the installments 5. Think about selling, we offer you dedicated support: sales and technical team at your disposal before, during and after the go-live + Soisy internal customer support team available to your customers via email and chat for any questions about the Soisy Buy Now Pay Later Soution, so you can focus on your work. 6. Offer a flexible solution to your customers, available both for credit/debit card and bank account “In the most important period of the year for us, with the Soisy interest-free loan and installment payment we increased sales by + 255% compared to the previous year. We are a fast growing company: this year we joined the ranking drawn up by Sole 24 Ore of the 450 leading growth companies in Italy out of over 5,000 candidate companies and we entered the Financial Times ranking of the 1000 companies with growth faster in Europe: it is also thanks to Soisy that we have been able to achieve this goal, increasing our sales, halving abandoned carts and significantly contributing to increasing oursales"- Daniel Giacomello, e-commerce manager StufeaPelletItalia.it Technogym, Stufe a Pellet Italia, Grohe, Diadora Fitness, Emma Materasso, Agrieuro, Raptus & Rose ... and other +1000 e-commerce companies have already chosen us to make their customers pay in +3 installments; and you, what are you waiting for?

module.name: prestasyncmaster
module.description: PrestaShop Sync Master service especially designed to perform import/update operations with the PrestaShop catalog
module.author: MyPrestaModules
module.description_full: PrestaShop Sync Master service especially designed to perform import/update operations with the PrestaShop catalog.
module.additional_description: Import & Update your product catalog smart and easily Let this service free you from manually managing your product catalog. File Formats Features CSV & Excel FormatsYou can use Excel formulas in your filesUpload your files directly from your PC, URL, FTP, SFTP, ZIP archiveUse your own, supplier, other store column format. Do not need to use fixed column format Images Import Import product images by URLs. Few images can be separated by a comma or in separate file columns. Also, you can import images for each combination. Categories Import Import categories by name or tree that often can be in different supplier files. Also, you can match categories from your file to store. Combinations Import For combinations import, you can have just combination values in your file. For stock updating, you can have just a combination quantity and SKU or barcode in your file. Import Conditions Disabling products that are out of stockImport/Skip new productsUpdate/Skip existing productsDisable, products that already are not available in your import fileSkip not needed products from importImport/Update products just from selected categories, suppliers, brands Smart Formulas & Custom Fields You can adjust all prices during import. You can create rules for different product categories or prices range.Round your prices during import to .99 or to .00Truncate product title or descriptionCreate tags from combination options, categoriesFilter products by any file columnAnd many more…

module.name: trustedshopseasyintegration

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

Ponad 30 000 sklepów internetowych w całej Europie korzysta z rozwiązań w zakresie budowy zaufania, które zapewniają większy ruch w sklepie, lepszą sprzedaż i wyższą stopę konwersji. Zestaw narzędzi Trusted Shops Easy Integration to najłatwiejszy i najszybszy sposób na przekonanie odwiedzających o wiarygodności swojego sklepu internetowego. Prosta instalacja gwarantuje użytkowanie produktu w zaledwie 5 minut i zwykle wymaga niewielkiej lub zerowej wiedzy technicznej. Dzięki naszemu zestawowi narzędzi Twój sklep zawsze jest na bieżąco pod względem technicznym, dzięki czemu nie musisz ponosić dodatkowych kosztów związanych z tą kwestią. Twoja korzyść: wystarczy kilka kliknięć, aby odwiedzający sklep internetowy widzieli elementy zaufania, takie jak Trustbadge i inne widżety, mogli skorzystać z Ochrony Kupującego i byli automatycznie proszeni o informacje zwrotne po złożeniu zamówienia. Pamiętaj o ważnej kwestii: Do korzystania z wtyczki Trusted Shops Easy Integration wymagane jest członkostwo w Trusted Shops. Więcej informacji o produktach i zaletach Trusted Shops można znaleźć na naszejstronie internetowej lub pod numerem telefonu +48 22 462 64 00.

module.name: pluginhiveshipping
module.description: Live shipping rates at checkout, print shipping labels & track orders easily
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Live shipping rates at checkout, print shipping labels & track orders easily. The app supports UPS, FedEx, Amazon Shipping, USPS, DHL Express, DHL Paket, PostNord, Aus Post, Canada Post, Parcelforce, Aramex, Blue Dart, TNT & 40+ carriers.
module.additional_description: Accurate Shipping Rates: Showing carrier-calculated shipping rates at checkout can prevent you from undercharging or overcharging customers, resulting in better customer satisfaction and fewer shipping-related issues. Print Shipping Labels: Printing shipping labels directly within your Prestashop store can help reduce human error and ensure that the correct shipping information is included on the label. Improved Customer Experience: Sending live tracking notifications to customers can improve the customer experience by keeping them informed of their shipment's progress and reducing anxiety about delivery times. Streamlined Shipping: The ability to add multiple carriers and automate shipping saves you time and effort, allowing you to focus on other aspects of your business. Expanded Customer Base: Using primary postal operators and global carriers can increase your customer base by offering more shipping options and reaching customers in different regions.

With features such as address autocompletion, reverse geocoding, and access to points of interest near a location, APlace.io revolutionizes the way you interact with geospatial data. APlace.io Address Autocomplete Module - Add address autocompletion with APlace.io Are you tired of grappling with inaccurate mailing addresses and dealing with delivery mishaps? Look no further than our Address Autocomplete module, exclusively designed to improve your store's order form. By adding this module, you can significantly enhance your cart conversion rates, amplify user satisfaction, and provide an overall superior shopping experience for your customers.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Stock Sync is an advanced inventory management tool that enables seamless synchronization of stock levels across over multiple platforms and suppliers.
module.additional_description: Stock Sync offers a powerful, automated solution that streamlines inventory management from multiple suppliers, dropshippers, and warehouse management, reducing the risks of overselling and underselling. Its flexible feed management, customizable scheduling, and dynamic pricing capabilities allow for efficient inventory updates and pricing adjustments without manual intervention. Designed for ease of use, Stock Sync caters to businesses of all sizes, supporting scalability from small online stores to large enterprises. It facilitates drop shipping, reduces manual workload, and enhances operational efficiency, enabling businesses to optimize their inventory processes and drive sales growth.
